Creation and Modification Log¶

This is a log of what I did and in what order to put this project together.

Initial Setup¶

Project Requirements¶

Initial requirements are:

  1. PyCharm Professional (2016.3)
  2. Python 3.5
  3. Access to the internet

Initial Steps¶

  1. Create a new Django project named “WorkTrekDjango.
    • Start by using the main Python 3.5 intrepreter for the project.
  2. Add some directories to it manually.
    1. behave
    2. docs
    3. tests
    4. venv
    5. wordtrek
    6. wordtrek/migrations
    7. work
  3. Create the virtual environment for this project in venv.
    • Based on Python 3.5
    • Added these packages to it:
      1. Django
      2. pytest-django
      3. Sphinx
      4. django-sphinx
      5. django-sphinx-autodoc
      6. behave-django
  4. Run the sphinx-quickstart tool.
  5. Started this log.
  6. Added this log and modules to the index.rst.
  7. Verify that the WordTrekDjango task works.
  8. Create a sphinx task and verify that it works.
  9. Run the tool “Run manage.py Task...”.
    • startapp wordtrek
    • This will create the starter files for the Django app itself.
  10. Add a few more directories that will be needed later.
    1. wordtrek/static
    2. wordtrek/static/wordtrek
    3. wordtrek/templates
    4. wordtrek/templates/admin
    5. wordtrek/templates/wordtrek
  11. Setup BDD (behave) as desired.
  12. Setup TDD(pytest) as desired.

Setup the database tables and fields¶

Remove the following sample rst stuff when done.

Sub-Section¶

Sub-Sub-Section¶

Paragraph¶

Official list of Python heading levels

  • # with overline, for parts
  • * with overline, for chapters
  • = for sections
  • - for subsections
  • ^ for subsubsections
  • ” for paragraphs

Blah blah italics bold

This is a numbered list

  1. Numbered items
  2. Numbered items
  3. Period can be replaced by a dash, right paren, etc., but is required.
This is a bulleted list
  • Bulleted items
  • Bulleted items
